data.title: Serbia Olympics basketball schedule 2024: How to watch every Nikola Jokic game live
data.meta_description: The Sporting News has everything you need to know about how to watch Nikola Jokic and the Serbia men's national basketball team competing in the 2024 Paris Olympics.
data.text:
In the past four years, Nikola Jokic has tallied three NBA MVPs, an NBA championship and a Finals MVP. This August in Paris with his native country of Serbia, he will try to add a 2024 Olympics gold medal to his extensive list of accomplishments.

Joker joins Nikola Jovic, Bogdan Bogdanovic and the Serbian men's national basketball team as one of the true contenders for the medal games. At last glance, the Serbs were listed on BetMGM as the the squad with the fourth-shortest odds to win it all, behind only USA, Canada and France.

It won't be an easy ride — Serbia will need to fight its way out of Group C, which includes odds-on favorite Team USA as well as Puerto Rico and South Sudan. USA carries heavy -500 odds on BetMGM to win gold, while Serbia yields +1400 odds.

Can Jokic lead Serbia to international glory in Paris? When will the Serbs face LeBron James, Joel Embiid and Team USA? The Sporting News has everything you need to know about Serbia's Olympic basketball schedule at the 2024 Paris Olympics, including its full list of tipoff times, TV coverage and streaming information.

MORE: Watch the 2024 Olympics with Fubo (7-day free trial)

Serbia Basketball Schedule 2024

The opening ceremony at the 2024 Olympics is Friday, July 26. The men's basketball tournament tips off on July 27 and ends with the medal games on Aug. 10.

Serbia is one of 12 teams to qualify for the Paris Olympics. It will be playing in Group C, which includes Team USA, Puerto Rico and South Sudan.

DateGameTime (ET)TV channelJuly 28Serbia vs. United States 11 a.m.NBC, FuboJuly 31Serbia vs. Puerto Rico11 a.m.PeacockAug. 3Serbia vs. South Sudan3 p.m.CNBC, Fubo Aug. 6Men's Quarterfinals*TBDUSA, E!, Peacock, FuboAug. 8Men's Semifinals*TBDUSA, Peacock, FuboAug. 10 Men's medal games*TBDNBC, USA, Fubo

*if qualified

STREAM THE 2024 SUMMER OLYMPICS IN PARIS FOR FREE

WATCH NOW

How to watch Olympic basketball games

TV channels: NBC | USA | E! | CNBC

Live streams: Fubo, Peacock, NBCOlympics.com

Two of Serbia's three games during the group phase will air live on national TV. NBC will carry the star-studded battle with Team USA and CNBC will broadcast the third game vs. South Sudan. The middle game against Puerto Rico will be a Peacock exclusive.

Almost every game of the 2024 Paris Olympics basketball tournament — can be streamed on Fubo, which offers a free seven-day trial. That way, you can try before you buy.

NBC and Fubo will carry the gold-medal game live.
